description: Listed Building Consent in connection with the separation of the basement of 60 Thornhill Square from the remainder of the property and the formation of a linking door in the party wall linking it with 59 Thornhill Square, formation of access stairs in front lightwell of 60, formation of door in wall between the front lighwells of 59 and 60 and of opening in wall between rear gardens of the two properties, and other internal and external alterations, in connection with the use of the basement of 60 in conjunction with the occupation of 59 as a single dwelling.
decision_conditions:
CONDITION:  Notwithstanding the plans hereby approved, consent is not given for the creation of the rectangular low level slot on the boundary wall between the rear gardens.

Reason:  To safeguard the special historic and architectural interest of the buildings included in the Statutory List.
